languages.text: {n}Невзирая на поражение в споре, монахи Ордена Молота вскоре нашли в себе достаточно смирения, чтобы примириться с итогами прений.{/n}
{n}In spite of losing the argument, the monks of the Order of the Hammer soon found enough humility within themselves to make peace with the results of the deliberations.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Невзирая на поражение в споре, монахи Ордена Молота вскоре нашли в себе достаточно смирения, чтобы примириться с итогами прений.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In spite of their loss in the debates, the monks of the Order of the Hammer have soon found enough humility within themselves to make peace with the results of the debate.{/n}
{n}In spite of their loss in the debates, the monks of the Order of the Hammer have soon found enough humility within themselves to make peace with the results of the debate.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管重锤修会的修士输掉了这场辩论，但他们很快就展现出谦卑的态度，平和地接受了审议结果。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of losing the argument, the monks of the Order of the Hammer soon found enough humility within themselves to make peace with the results of the deliberations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管重锤修会的修士输掉了这场辩论，但他们很快就展现出谦卑的态度，平和地接受了审议结果。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A pesar de perder la discusión, los monjes de la Orden del Martillo pronto encontraron suficiente humildad en su interior para aceptar los resultados de las deliberaciones.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of losing the argument, the monks of the Order of the Hammer soon found enough humility within themselves to make peace with the results of the deliberations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de perder la discusión, los monjes de la Orden del Martillo pronto encontraron suficiente humildad en su interior para aceptar los resultados de las deliberaciones.{/n}

languages.text: {n}議論には敗れたものの、鉄槌の修道会に属する修道士たちはすぐに審議の結果を受け入れるだけの謙虚さを示した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of losing the argument, the monks of the Order of the Hammer soon found enough humility within themselves to make peace with the results of the deliberations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}議論には敗れたものの、鉄槌の修道会に属する修道士たちはすぐに審議の結果を受け入れるだけの謙虚さを示した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malgré ce revers, les moines de l'Ordre du Marteau font rapidement preuve de suffisamment d'humilité pour accepter le résultat des délibérations.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of losing the argument, the monks of the Order of the Hammer soon found enough humility within themselves to make peace with the results of the deliberations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré ce revers, les moines de l'Ordre du Marteau font rapidement preuve de suffisamment d'humilité pour accepter le résultat des délibérations.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Obwohl sie den Disput verloren hatten, fanden die Mönche des Ordens des Hammers bald genügend Demut in ihren Herzen, um ihren Frieden mit dem Ergebnis der Beratungen zu schließen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of losing the argument, the monks of the Order of the Hammer soon found enough humility within themselves to make peace with the results of the deliberations.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çekiç Tarikatı keşişleri, tartışmayı kaybetmelerine rağmen kısa süre içinde müzakerelerin sonuçlarını kabullenecek tevazuyu göstermeyi başardılar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of losing the argument, the monks of the Order of the Hammer soon found enough humility within themselves to make peace with the results of the deliberations.{/n}
